document_data.mainbody:
The kiira NVaelahr were 24 gems were used by the undercover agents of the NVaelahr before the fall of Myth Drannor. They stored memories and magic like a regular kiira, but also facilitated mental communication.
In 1374 DR, Khelben "Blackstaff" Arunsun attached a stone like this to the forehead of Tsarra Chaadren to avoid her mind being overloaded by his thoughts after the pair became linked during a magical explosion.
